TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCell extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个单元格。

span.span: Represents a cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类表示控件中的一个单元格 。The class represents a cell in a control. 您可以使用 属性来指定或确定单元格的内容。You can use the property to specify or determine the contents of the cell. 类允许您控制单元格内容的显示方式。The class allows you to control how the contents of the cell are displayed. 通过设置和属性来指定单元格中内容的对齐方式 。The alignment of the contents in the cell are specified by setting the and properties. 您可以使用 属性来指定单元中单元格的内容是否换行。You can use the property to specify whether the contents of the cell wrap in the cell. 您还可以指定由控件表示的表中的行数或列数由 单个单元格占用。You can also specify how many rows or columns in the table, represented by a control, are occupied by an individual cell. 和 属性分别控制使用的行数和列数。The and properties control how many rows and columns are used, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建表，以编程方式向表中添加元素，并在网页上显示该表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table, add elements to the table programmatically, and display the table on the Web page. 请注意如何 实例化控件，并设置其属性值。Note how controls are instantiated and their property values are set. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会重写基类的 方法并首先调用基方法，然后添加与 属性、 属性和属性相对应的属性 。The method overrides the base class's method and first calls the base method and then adds the attributes corresponding to the property, the property and the property. 如果 属性引用 的无法找到， 则会引发。If the property refers to a that can not be found, an is thrown. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便为每个单元格呈现自定义标题特性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a custom title attribute is rendered for each cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便 正确呈现控件特性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that the control attributes are properly rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 控件包含子控件，则调用基类的 方法; 否则， 会将控件的 属性值作为 对象添加到 控件的 。If the control contains child controls then the base class's method is called; otherwise, the control's property value is added as a object to the control's . 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便将对象正确添加到 控件 中。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that objects are properly added to the control .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个由空格分隔的列表，该列表包含与 控件关联的表标题单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a space-separated list of table header cells associated with the control.

value.span: 字符串数组，包含关联表标题单元格的标识符。

span.span: An array of strings containing the identifiers of the associated table header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含标头单元格编程标识符的列表，该列表提供控件的标头信息 。The property contains a list of header cell programmatic identifiers that provide header information of the control. 标题单元标识符的列表以逗号分隔的列表形式呈现到 HTML `` 元素的属性中 `header` 。The list of header cell identifiers is rendered as a comma delimited list into the HTML `` element's `header` attribute. 设置属性时， 请使用逗号分隔的字符串列表。When setting the property use a comma delimited list of strings. 如果列表的元素未被识别为有效的表头单元格，则 调用时将引发 。If an element of the list is not recognized as a valid table header cell an is thrown when the is invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定 控件的属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the property of a control. 特别要注意的是，将最后一行中的单元格关联到三个标题单元格的方式。In particular, note how the cell in the last row is associated to three header cells. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中单元格跨越的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the control that the cell spans.

value.span: 呈现的表中单元格跨越的列数。

span.span: The number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定呈现的表中单元格跨越的列数。Use the property to specify or determine the number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans. 例如，如果将此属性设置为 `2` ，则单元格将在控件中占用两列 。For example, if you set this property to `2`, the cell takes up two columns in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定 控件的 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the of a control. 特别注意，最后一行的单个单元格跨三列。In particular, note how the last row's single cell spans three columns. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents in the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定单元格内容的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cell. 枚举中指定了可能使用的值 。The possible values for use are specified in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定 控件的属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the property of a control. 特别注意，最后一行中的单元格是左对齐的。In particular, note how the cell in the last row is left justified. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 控件具有子控件或在派生类中被重写，则调用基类的 方法; 否则，将属性的值 写入 对象。If the control has child controls or is overridden in a derived class the base class's method is called; otherwise, the value of the property is written to the object. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义控件中的方法，以便在该 单元格的内容中插入自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it custom text is inserted in the cell's contents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定单元格的文本内容。Use the property to specify or determine the text contents of the cell. 此属性通常用于以编程方式更新单元的内容。This property is commonly used to programmatically update the contents of a cell. > [!NOTE] > 设置 属性将清除中包含的任何其他控件 。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the . > [!CAUTION] > 控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意的客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建控件的新实例 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of a control programmatically. 特别要注意的是如何 使用属性来设置控件的内容 。In particular, note how the property is used for setting the contents of the control. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[TableCell#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[TableCell#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#5)]
